and Republican Mark Kirk are in a close

there's been answered I'm Monica Devi
reporting for the New York Times the
senate race in illinois is one of the
ugliest races I've ever seen on the one
hand the Republicans have accused alexi
giannoulias who's serving his first
tournament state treasurer of being what
they like to call a mob bankers he made
Tony Soprano proud on the other hand the
Democrats accused Mark Kirk a long time
congressman of inflating his military
service record perks claimed he fought
in the first Iraq war was not true the
punches and counter punches have
definitely drawn notice you don't miss
remember being in in wartime I think
they're grasping at straws really I do
Mac grouchy and lilius he lost his
family business he was the banker and he
put on all these loans to mobsters some
of the accusations are true at least to
a degree mr. Kirk has apologized for
inflating his resume at times and mr.
junuh Liz's family bank which was taken
over by government regulators last
spring has been accused of making loans
to people with connections to organized
crime though mr. giannoulias has denied
involvement we're here in the Palmer
House Hotel in downtown Chicago and Bill
Clinton is speaking behind me on behalf
of alexi giannoulias this is a very
clear choice this is a seat that carries
great symbolic importance for both the
Democrats and the Republicans the
Democrats would really like to hold on
to it because this was the seat that was
held by President Obama meanwhile the
Republicans see a real opportunity here
they think they have a better chance
with Mark Kirk so now we have one week
to go and the race will be very close so
we're at the union league club here in
downtown Chicago and Mark Kirk has just
spoken to the Rotary Club here and this
was a much more sober quiet reading from
a podium speech as you would to the
Rotary Club and actually I was struck by
the imagery Mark Kirk is a very clean
cut almost old-fashioned looking
candidate he doesn't yell he doesn't
make jokes he's not stylistic alexi
giannoulias has not been doing this very
long other Democrats here but he can
deliver his lines with a bit of flourish
and he can get a crowd worked up whether
it's a decision they make over style or
over substance or over all these Barb's
that have been traded back and forth
voters in Illinois will certainly have a
